title: VMware security advisory (AV25-451)
description: On July 24, 2025, VMware published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: Tanzu Platform for Cloud Foundry  version 4.0.38+LTS-T
Tanzu Platform for Cloud Foundry  version 6.0.18+LTS-T
Tanzu Platform for Cloud Foundry  version 10.0.8
Tanzu Platform for Cloud Foundry  version 10.2.1+LTS-T
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
